sentences.sentence: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined.
sentences.translation: 充满信心地朝着你梦想的方向前进，过你一直向往的生活。

sentences.sentence: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.
sentences.translation: 行动不一定能带来快乐，但不行动一定不能。

sentences.sentence: It is the set of the sails, not the direction of the wind that determines which way we will go.
sentences.translation: 决定我们去向的不是风的方向，而是如何架起船帆。

sentences.sentence: I need to believe that something extraordinary is possible.
sentences.translation: 我需要相信世界上总有非凡之事。

sentences.sentence: There are young men who do not work, but the world is not proud of them.
sentences.translation: 有些年轻人并不工作，但世界并不以他们为荣。
